00102 
00111         template<class T> void addServiceObject(
00112                 std::string serviceName, std::string serviceDisplayName, std::string category, T *service, std::string help = "")
00113         {
00114                 MethodTable<T> table(*this, service, serviceName);
00115 
00116                 addService(serviceName, serviceDisplayName, category, help);
00117                 service->registerMethods(table);
00118         }
